statements: SELECT * FROM CoursePrerequisites WHERE course_id = 1;
SELECT prerequisite_course_id, course_id FROM CoursePrerequisites WHERE course_id > 5;
SELECT course_id, prerequisite_course_id FROM CoursePrerequisites WHERE prerequisite_course_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM CoursePrerequisites WHERE prerequisite_course_id = 3 AND course_id <> 2;
SELECT course_id, prerequisite_course_id FROM CoursePrerequisites WHERE course_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM CoursePrerequisites WHERE course_id = 1 AND prerequisite_course_id = 2;
SELECT course_id, prerequisite_course_id FROM CoursePrerequisites WHERE course_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY course_id DESC;
SELECT COUNT(course_id) AS total_prerequisites FROM CoursePrerequisites GROUP BY course_id HAVING COUNT(course_id) > 1;
SELECT course_id, COUNT(prerequisite_course_id) AS num_prerequisites FROM CoursePrerequisites GROUP BY course_id ORDER BY num_prerequisites DESC;
SELECT course_id, prerequisite_course_id FROM CoursePrerequisites WHERE course_id = 1 UNION SELECT course_id, prerequisite_course_id FROM CoursePrerequisites WHERE course_id = 2;
SELECT course_id, course_name, prerequisites FROM courses;
SELECT course_name, course_id, prerequisites FROM courses ORDER BY course_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM courses WHERE course_id = 1;
SELECT course_name FROM courses WHERE prerequisites IS NOT NULL;
SELECT course_name, prerequisites FROM courses WHERE course_name LIKE '%Math%';
SELECT * FROM courses WHERE course_name = 'Math 101';
SELECT course_name, prerequisites FROM courses WHERE course_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY course_name DESC;
SELECT course_name, COUNT(*) AS num_dependencies FROM courses JOIN course_dependencies ON courses.course_id = course_dependencies.course_id GROUP BY course_name HAVING num_dependencies > 2;
SELECT DISTINCT course_name FROM courses WHERE prerequisites IS NOT NULL;
SELECT course_name, dependency_course_id FROM course_dependencies JOIN courses ON course_dependencies.dependency_course_id = courses.course_id;
SELECT * FROM Course;
SELECT course_name, course_credit FROM Course;
SELECT course_id, course_name FROM Course ORDER BY course_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Prerequisite WHERE prerequisite_course_id = 3;
SELECT course_name, course_credit FROM Course WHERE course_credit > 3;
SELECT * FROM Course WHERE course_credit > 3 ORDER BY course_id DESC;
SELECT course_id, course_name FROM Course WHERE course_credit < 4 ORDER BY course_name ASC;
SELECT course_id, course_name, course_credit FROM Course WHERE course_id = 2;
SELECT Course.course_id, Course.course_name, Prerequisite.prerequisite_id FROM Course JOIN Prerequisite ON Course.course_id = Prerequisite.course_id ORDER BY Prerequisite.prerequisite_id ASC;

SELECT Course.course_id, Course.course_name, Dependency.dependent_course_id FROM Course JOIN Dependency ON Course.course_id = Dependency.course_id WHERE Dependency.dependent_course_id = 4 ORDER BY Course.course_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Course;
SELECT course_name, department_id FROM Course ORDER BY department_id DESC;
SELECT course_name, department_id FROM Course WHERE department_id = 2;
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM Student WHERE student_id = 1;

SELECT cs.sequence_id, c.course_name, pc.course_name AS prerequisite_course_name FROM CourseSequence AS cs JOIN Course AS c ON cs.course_id = c.course_id JOIN Course AS pc ON cs.prerequisite_course_id = pc.course_id;
SELECT * FROM Course ORDER BY course_id DESC;
SELECT course_name, department_id FROM Course WHERE department_id = 1;
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM Course WHERE prerequisite_course_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM Student WHERE student_id BETWEEN 1 AND 100;
SELECT * FROM Department ORDER BY department_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Course
SELECT course_name, credits FROM Course WHERE credits > 3
SELECT student_name, major FROM Student ORDER BY student_name DESC
SELECT * FROM StudentCourses WHERE grade = 'A' ORDER BY student_id ASC
SELECT course_name, prereq_course_id FROM Prerequisite JOIN Course ON Prerequisite.course_id = Course.course_id
SELECT * FROM Course WHERE credits > 3 ORDER BY course_name DESC;
SELECT course_name, credits FROM Course WHERE credits BETWEEN 2 AND 4 ORDER BY credits ASC;
SELECT student_name, major FROM Student WHERE major = 'Computer Science' ORDER BY student_id;
SELECT student_id, course_name FROM StudentCourses JOIN Course ON StudentCourses.course_id = Course.course_id WHERE grade = 'A' ORDER BY student_id, course_name;
SELECT DISTINCT course_id, prereq_course_id FROM Prerequisite ORDER BY course_id ASC, prereq_course_id DESC;
